jcr:content.jcr:title: Hero
jcr:content.pageTitle: HERO Advanced Optical Sensor for Gaming
jcr:content.searchTitle: HERO Advanced Optical Sensor for Gaming
jcr:content.seoDescription: Discover HERO sensors for Logitech G gaming mice. Designed for precision and energy efficiency over hours of gameplay.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G HERO Advanced Optical Sensor for Gaming

copyblock.mainDescription: Extreme performance and 10x improvement in power efficiency. This is the future of gaming mice.
copyblock.subTitle: Next-Gen Gaming Sensor

image_banner_copy_59.altText: Battery life on G603 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603, with the revolutionary HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, lets you play without wires—without limits. Enhanced with 10x sensor efficiency, this is a breakthrough in battery life and the new standard in wireless gaming.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription:
HERO

superscriptR

sensor is a feat of engineering 3 years in the making. This revolutionary new sensor is designed for unrivaled performance and incredible power efficiency.

item3.featuretitle: Power EfficiencyCompared to previous generation sensor in premium Logitech G gaming mice.

image_banner_copy_co.altText: HERO is in the upper echelon in both performance and power efficiency compared to Razer, Steelseries sensors

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: Pair G613 wireless mechanical keyboard with G603 wireless gaming mouse to acquire the complete wireless desktop solution. G603 features our next generation HERO sensor, LIGHTSPEED wireless, Hi-Lo power management system and more high performance features that gaming enthusiasts demand.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: HERO is a true breakthrough in performance-to-power ratios, bringing forth a new generation of high-performance and long-lasting wireless gaming mice. HERO pushes past the constraint of existing sensors to set the new benchmark for performance and efficiency changing the playing field for gaming mice.

media_tile_copy_copy.altText: HERO delivers approximately double the read speed (cts/ms) than competitors at 400 IPS
media_tile_copy_copy.text: HERO delivers accuracy at velocities over 400 IPS across the full DPI range with zero smoothing, acceleration or filtering. HERO sensor gives players unsurpassed responsiveness, and precision.

media_tile_copy_copy_1563192616.altText: Battery life on G603 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse
media_tile_copy_copy_1563192616.text: HERO utilizes a smart power management system to continuously adjust frame rate based on the movement of the mouse. This allows exacting performance plus constantly managed and minimized power consumption. This enables 10x power efficiency compared to previous generation.Compared to previous generation sensor in premium Logitech G gaming mice.

copyblock.mainDescription: Informed by over a decade of experience, our engineers invented a next-generation optics system to maximize the accuracy and energy efficiency of HERO. A perfectly positioned IR LED drives illumination through an innovative dual lens, so HERO sensor can more accurately detect, capture and correlate pixel-precise motion. Even the outer cover is carefully molded to provide the right amount of light and focus to the lens. Each component was subject to countless hours of engineering and testing to ensure optimal contribution to sensor and gaming performance.

Logitech G set out to solve the biggest issues with wireless—connectivity, latency and battery life. HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless deliver robust wireless connectivity, ultra-low wireless latency, and amazing battery life with absolutely no compromises in performance. Wireless gaming is here.
